change-color.description: Change color when power consumption becomes Low, High or Critical
change-color.tooltip:
Selecting this option, this applet becomes
 green when the Low Power Consumption Threshold is reached,
 orange when the High Power Consumption Threshold is reached,
 red when the Critical Power Consumption Threshold is reached.

only-colors.description: Only use colors to alert me
only-colors.tooltip:
Select this option to not display text alerts in horizontal panels.
(No text alert is ever displayed on vertical panels.)
